pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, April 30, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, April 30, 2018:

All times local.

Vancouver, British-Columbia

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an announcement with Amazon. A media availability will follow.

349 West Georgia Street

Note for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9 a.m. at the 680 Homer Street entrance to register.

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion with Vancouver business leaders.

Vancouver Economic Commission
401 West Georgia Street

Note for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:45 a.m. in the first floor lobby to register
